## RestCaching interface

Contains methods used for handling 'caching'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RestCaching extends TypedPropertyDescriptor<any> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> TypedPropertyDescriptor&lt;any&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getCachedResponse](./rest.restcaching.getcachedresponse.md) | (request: HttpRequest&lt;any&gt;) =&gt; HttpResponse&lt;any&gt; \| null | Gets response from cache |
|  [saveResponseToCache](./rest.restcaching.saveresponsetocache.md) | (request: HttpRequest&lt;any&gt;, response: HttpResponse&lt;any&gt;) =&gt; HttpResponse&lt;any&gt; | Saves response to cache for provided request and returns this response |
